translations: n.出现，到来，问世；基督降临节（Advent）；基督降临，基督复临（Advent）

phrs.translation: (重要人物或事件)…的出现(或到来)

sentences.sentence: The advent of the computer has brought this sort of task within the bounds of possibility.
sentences.translation: 电脑的出现使这种任务的完成成为可能。

sentences.sentence: Since the advent of television people have been prophesying the death of the book.
sentences.translation: 自从电视出现以来，人们一直在预言书的消亡。

sentences.sentence: The advent of new technologies has added about 4.2 million barrels per day to the crude oil market.
sentences.translation: 新技术的出现使原油市场每天增加了约420万桶的交易。
